keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Rescuers searching the area where two Marine helicopters crashed off Hawaii last week have found some life rafts that were carried aboard the aircraft, but no sign of the 12 crew members who were on board.

headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Rafts Found From Crashed Helicopters
headline.main: Hawaii: Rafts Found From Crashed Helicopters

snippet: Rescuers searching the area where two Marine helicopters crashed off Hawaii last week have found some life rafts that were carried aboard the aircraft, but no sign of the 12 crew members who were on board.
abstract: Rescuers discover three inflated life rafts off coast of Hawaii while searching for 12 missing crew members aboard two Marine helicopters that crashed in area; rafts show no signs of life and search for crew members continues.
